languages.text: The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humanity, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.
languages.original_text: Инквизиция всеми средствами уничтожает скверну, вызванную силами Хаоса, еретиками, мутантами и пришельцами. Инквизитор имеет право призвать к себе в услужение любые подразделения вооруженных сил Империума — чем сильнее угроза человечеству, тем мощнее собираются армии, чтобы с ней бороться.

traits.locale_text: The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humankind, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.

The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humankind, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.

The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humanity, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.

languages.text: Инквизиция всеми средствами уничтожает скверну, вызванную силами Хаоса, еретиками, мутантами и пришельцами. Инквизитор имеет право призвать к себе в услужение любые подразделения вооруженных сил Империума — чем сильнее угроза человечеству, тем мощнее собираются армии, чтобы с ней бороться.

Die Inquisition setzt alle Mittel ein, um die Verderbnis auszurotten, die von den Mächten des Chaos, Häretikern, Mutanten oder Außerirdischen verursacht wird. Jede der vielen Streitkräfte des Imperiums kann in den Dienst eines Inquisitors gestellt werden – je größer die Bedrohung für die Menschheit erscheint, desto mehr Mächte werden zu ihrer Bekämpfung zusammengezogen.
languages.original_text: The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humanity, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.

traits.locale_text: Die Inquisition setzt alle Mittel ein, um die Verderbnis auszurotten, die von den Mächten des Chaos, Häretikern, Mutanten oder Außerirdischen verursacht wird. Jede der vielen Streitkräfte des Imperiums kann in den Dienst eines Inquisitors gestellt werden – je größer die Bedrohung für die Menschheit erscheint, desto mehr Mächte werden zu ihrer Bekämpfung zusammengezogen.

languages.text: L'Inquisition fait tout ce qui est en son pouvoir pour éradiquer la corruption engendrée par les forces du Chaos, les hérétiques, les mutants ou les xénos. N'importe quelle force de combat de l'Imperium peut être mise au service d'un inquisiteur. Plus la menace est considérée comme grande pour l'Humanité, plus les forces rassemblées pour la combattre sont importantes.
languages.original_text: The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humanity, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.

traits.locale_text: L'Inquisition fait tout ce qui est en son pouvoir pour éradiquer la corruption engendrée par les forces du Chaos, les hérétiques, les mutants ou les xénos. N'importe quelle force de combat de l'Imperium peut être mise au service d'un Inquisiteur. Plus la menace est considérée comme grande pour l'Humanité, plus les forces rassemblées pour la combattre sont importantes.

languages.text: 审判庭会采取一切手段，消灭由混沌势力、异端分子、变种人或异形造成的腐化。帝国众多军事力量中的任何军队，都可能会被审判官征召服务。毕竟，当人类面对重大威胁时，帝国需要聚集强大的力量与之抗衡。
languages.original_text: The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humanity, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.

traits.locale_text: 审判庭会采取一切手段，消灭由混沌势力、异端分子、变种人或异形造成的腐化。帝国众多军事力量中的任何军队，都可能会被审判官征召服务。毕竟，当人类面对重大威胁时，帝国需要聚集强大的力量与之抗衡。

languages.text: 異端審問庁はフォース・オブ・ケイオス、異端者、変異体、異星人の勢力によって引き起こされた腐敗を根絶するためにあらゆる手段を用いる。異端審問官は、帝国のあらゆる戦闘部隊を従軍させることができ、人類に対する脅威が大きければ大きいほど、それに対抗するために集められた部隊も大きくなる。
languages.original_text: The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humanity, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.

traits.locale_text: 異端審問庁はフォース・オブ・ケイオス、異端者、変異体、異星人の勢力によって引き起こされた腐敗を根絶するためにあらゆる手段を用いる。異端審問官は、帝国のあらゆる戦闘部隊を従軍させることができ、人類に対する脅威が大きければ大きいほど、それに対抗するために集められた部隊も大きくなる。

languages.text: La Inquisición se sirve de una plétora de medios para erradicar la corrupción creada por las fuerzas del Caos, herejes, mutantes o alienígenas. Cualquiera de las numerosas fuerzas beligerantes del Imperium pueden pasar a servir a un Inquisidor. Cuanto mayor sea la amenaza para la Humanidad, más copiosas serán las fuerzas que se desplieguen para combatirla.
languages.original_text: The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humanity, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.

traits.locale_text: La Inquisición se sirve de una plétora de medios para erradicar la corrupción creada por las fuerzas del Caos, herejes, mutantes o alienígenas. Cualquiera de las numerosas fuerzas beligerantes del Imperium pueden pasar a servir a un Inquisidor. Cuanto mayor sea la amenaza para la Humanidad, más copiosas serán las fuerzas que se desplieguen para combatirla.

languages.text: Engizisyon; Kaos güçlerinin, kâfirlerin, mutantların veya uzaylıların neden olduğu yozluğun kökünü kurutmak adına her türlü yönteme başvurur. Bir Engizisyoncu, İmparatorluk'un herhangi bir silahlı kuvvet birimi üstünde yetki sahibidir; gerektiğinde onları silah altına çağırabilir. İnsanlığa yönelik tehdit ne kadar büyükse onunla savaşmak için toplanan güç de bir o kadar büyük olur.
languages.original_text: The Inquisition uses any and all means to exterminate the corruption caused by the forces of Chaos, heretics, mutants, or aliens. Any of the Imperium's many fighting forces may be pressed into the service of an Inquisitor — the greater the perceived threat to Humanity, the greater are the forces gathered to fight it.
